subject: British Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Since being knighted a couple of years ago as a member of golf’s Big Five — with Tiger Woods, Phil Mickelson, Vijay Singh and Retief Goosen — Ernie Els has seen his stellar reputation lose its shine.
snippet: Since being knighted a couple of years ago as a member of golf’s Big Five — with Tiger Woods, Phil Mickelson, Vijay Singh and Retief Goosen — Ernie Els has seen his stellar reputation lose its shine.
